abstract.text: Displays a simple HUD window containing a progress indicator and two optional labels for short messages.

inlineContent.text: To still allow touches to pass through the HUD, you can set hud.isEventDeliveryEnabled = true.
HUD is a UI class and should therefore only be accessed on the main thread.
